title: Freedom to Play
description: Lust or Love? Desire or Commitment? Romantic and wild, Freedom to Play is a novel that will excite you, thrill you and fill you with passion. When recently divorced Nicole is convinced by her close friends to explore her sexual desires, she is shocked by a world she never knew existed. Naive and innocent, Nicole is thrilled as she explores her deepest sexual feelings. But when the beautiful and strong Anthony unexpectedly enters her life, she is stunned at their chemistry. Is she too far down the path of sexual self-discovery to turn back? Can she choose between lust or love?
author: R.  Miller
